setEffects.4: When Normal, Charged, or Plunging Attacks, Elemental Skills or Elemental Bursts hit an opponent, each attack type can provide 1 stack of Nymph's Croix for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Each stack's duration is counted independently. While 1, 2, or 3 or more Nymph's Croix stacks are in effect, ATK is increased by 7%/16%/25%, and Hydro DMG is increased by 4%/9%/15%.
